description: describes the characteristics, spatial and temporal extent of the intended object to be observed

objectiveId.description: a unique mdJSON system identifier for the objective

identifier.description: code used to identify the objective

function.description: role or purpose performed by or activity performed at the objective

extent.description: extent information including the bounding box, bounding polygon, vertical and temporal extent of the objective

objectiveOccurrence.description: event or events associated with objective completion

pass.description: pass of the platform over the objective

sensingInstrument.description: instrument which senses the objective data
